name: El Titan de Bronze - Redemption Sun Grown - Toro
brand: El Titan de Bronze, Redemption Sun Grown
additionalNotes: Established in Little Havana, Miami, FL since 1995 El Titan De Bronze produces exclusive cigars of the highest quality. Its production method is made in the traditional Cuban style of the filling pipe and finished with a triple cap, handmade with "Level 9" rollers. Its manufacture is always inspected by other Master Roller to ensure the best production of cigars which is limited to few quantities to ensure the quality and consistency that only a high-level manufacturer can produce
